data.oai_dc:dc: With more than 158,000 specimens (15,000 objects digitised), the herbarium of Erlangen (ER, http://www.herbarium-erlangense.nat.uni-erlangen.de/) is the second largest of Bavaria, Germany. In addition to the possibility to search for taxon, collector and locality, images of over 1650 objects can be freely accessed.|16,261 occurrences
